item.title: AJonP - Rebranded
Firebase Project
item.description: Firebase Hosting setup Firebase Console Go to the Firebase Console If this is your first firebase project you will need to Sign in to Google Create Project Now you can click the button to add a new Project Hosting At this point many if the blogs will start talking about setting up the database, but I want to keep this really simple “Hello World” style. You can now navigate over to the hosting area within firebase.

item.title: Oops, you are offline.
item.description: You should try to find some internet connection to browse here.
